ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The Joes dispatch a team in reaction to a hijacked ship aboard which Dr. Burkhart is one of the hostages. However, the hijacking pirates are supported by the Red Shadows and they deploy the massively powerful cyborg against the boarding party and one of their advanced crafts against the Joes' W.H.A.L.E.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 14:28:53. [CVDB390513] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:20:48. [Issue ID 1092255]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Gary Erskine,James Brown (J. Brown),Larry Hama,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Ali,Lift-Ticket,Torpedo,Ismael,Cutter,Red Shadows [Black Major,Scarlett,Stalker,Muton],G.I. Joe [Beach Head,Roadblock,Gung-Ho,Dr. Adele Burkhart,Polly,Ahmed,Wild Bill],Prince Ngoto,Shipwreck,Lifeline,Duke
